# flatRTFD

**Type Property**

A type that represents flattened Rich Text Format Directory documents.

## Declaration

```swift
static var flatRTFD: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The pasteboard uses a flattened Rich Text Format Directory format.

The identifier for this type is `com.apple.flat-rtfd`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeCompositeContent].

## Application files

- **pdf**: A type that represents Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) documents.
- **rtfd**: A type that represents Rich Text Format Directory documents.
- **epub**: A type that represents data in the electronic publication (EPUB) format.
